articles.title: About Me
articles.contents:
Background
My name is Bradley O’Guinn. I am a doctoral student
in the School of Criminal Justice at the University of Cincinnati. My
research focuses on policing and the geographic concentration of crime.
I enjoy using R and ArcGIS to analyze
large amounts of data and identify high crime places. My recent work has
been featured in Crime and Delinquency and Police Practice
and Research.
Connect:




Education

Ph.D. in Criminal Justice | August 2019 - Present
